_header: For wind or rain for water or cold or heat
_description: The Three Kings of Cologne, attributed to Lydgate — 859 lines in rhyme royal stanzas

BLAdd31042.First Lines: ffor wynde or Rayne ffor watere or colde or heteþay neuer ne ceysede whils þay leueande were…
BLAdd31042.Last Lines: …ffor whose Merites es grace dayly wroghteTo his honour whom þay in Bedlem soghte
BLAdd31042.Note: About 100 lines missing at beginning. Ends “Amen.”
